The cold spell is expected to persist for several days, with outskirts potentially dipping to sub-zero temperatures. IMD has issued warnings for dense fog and its impact on travel and health.

description: Delhi shivered under a severe cold wave as temperatures plummeted to 3.2°C, the lowest in three years.  Authorities issued an orange alert for Tuesday due to the biting cold and dense fog.  While icy winds from the Himalayas are blamed, a western disturbance is expected to bring a slight temperature rise by Thursday, offering some relief from the freezing conditions.

Clemson professor fired over Charlie Kirk post reaches settlement
description: Clemson University professor Dr. Joshua Bregy has settled with the university after his September 2025 termination over a social media post about Charlie Kirk.  Under the agreement, Bregy will remain employed with benefits until May 15, 2026, without teaching duties, and will receive letters of recommendation. The ACLU of South Carolina hailed the settlement as a win for academic freedom.

title: Indian-origin gynecologist found guilty of medical malpractice in US
description: Memphis gynecologic oncologist Dr Sanjeev Kumar faces conviction on multiple counts, including medical device adulteration and healthcare fraud. Prosecutors allege he performed unnecessary procedures using improperly reprocessed single-use devices on thousands of patients, billing millions to Medicare and Medicaid. Dr Kumar maintains his innocence, asserting his disinfection methods were scientific.

title: UP horror: Man shoots wife dead inside police station
description: A shocking incident unfolded at a police station in Hardoi where a man shot his wife dead. The victim had reportedly eloped with her lover days prior. The husband, Anoop, arrived at the station and fatally shot Soni in front of officers. Two cops have been suspended following this severe security lapse.

title: Pro-Palestinian protest at Stanford leads to felony trial for five students: Here’s what to know
description: A jury trial has commenced for five Stanford University students charged in connection with a pro-Palestinian protest that occupied the university president's offices. Prosecutors allege significant property damage, while the defense asserts the defendants are exercising their right to a jury trial. This case is a rare instance of demonstrators facing trial amid a broader wave of campus protests.

title: Lauren Kyle applauds Leon Draisaitl’s latest Oilers achievement
description: Edmonton Oilers star Leon Draisaitl achieved a remarkable 1,000 NHL points, a milestone celebrated with his family and teammates. Despite a recent shootout loss, Draisaitl's historic achievement, coupled with his two-goal performance, provided a significant spark for the team.  Connor McDavid also extended his impressive point streak, highlighting individual brilliance amidst team aspirations.

title: Happy Lohri 2026: Top wishes to share with your loved ones
description: Lohri 2026, on January 13th, celebrates the end of winter with bonfires, songs, and traditional delicacies, honoring harvest and longer days. This vibrant festival in northern India, especially Punjab, signifies gratitude, hard work, and intergenerational togetherness, marking the Sun's Capricorn entry and ushering in prosperity.

title: Vanessa and Natalia Bryant’s combined net worth after Kobe Bryant
description: Vanessa and Natalia Bryant, following the tragic loss of Kobe Bryant, have amassed a combined net worth of $606 million. Vanessa manages the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation and benefits from brand deals and business ventures. Natalia, a budding model, contributes to her $6 million net worth through her career and inheritance.

title: Gisele’s family reportedly still prefers Tom Brady over Joaquim Valente
description: Gisele Bündchen’s family is reportedly uneasy about her marriage to Joaquim Valente, with Tom Brady still serving as a point of comparison. Sources claim relatives worry about financial imbalance and potential prenup loopholes, despite the couple’s happiness and growing family. While Bündchen appears confident in her choice, those closest to her remain cautious about long term security.
